summary: Our "Green Book"— Standards for Internal Control in the Federal Government—provides the framework for establishing and maintaining an effective internal control system. Internal control is a process designed to help an entity achieve its objectives. Our proposed changes provide requirements, guidance, and resources to address risks related to fraud, improper payments, information security, and the implementation of new or changed programs, including emergency assistance programs...
title: Standards for Internal Control in the Federal Government: 2024 Exposure Draft
